title: Paige
description: Four horrible break-ups.Being overlooked for promotion after promotion.Paige has had enough. On a whim, she quits life in America and heads to Italy for a much needed break.One drunken dinner with friends at a swanky members only club, Paige sets her eyes on two empty thrones set on a stage and decides she no longer dreams of becoming a marketing executive, she wants to be Queen.Empowered by her new found freedom.Empowered by the women in her circle of friends.Empowered by her choice to not be walked all over by men and their false promises.She is determined to be on top of her world, crown and all.
author: M.J. Fields
